description: The interior of the Tower of Justice, CP9's headquarters at Enies Lobby. A large tower with multiple floors containing various rooms, secret passages, and battle arenas. This is where the Straw Hat Pirates fight the CP9 agents to rescue Robin.

keyEvents.title: Diable Jambe Debut
keyEvents.description: Sanji unveils his revolutionary Diable Jambe technique for the first time while battling Jabra in the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of Sanji's most iconic techniques is first revealed.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Defeats Jabra
keyEvents.description: Sanji defeats Jabra with Diable Jambe: Flambage Shot in the Tower of Justice, securing his key for Robin's rescue.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the completion of one of the critical CP9 battles in the rescue mission.

statusHistory.reason: Tower serves as the battleground for the Straw Hats vs CP9
